Package de.intarsys.tools.concurrent

Interface Summary
ITaskListener  
ITaskListenerSupport  
 

Class Summary
AbstractFutureTask<R> This is an alternate implementation for FutureTask, which is in some cases not flexible enough.
GenericFutureTask<R> A generic implementation for a FutureTask.
PACKAGE  
SynchronousExecutorService A simple ExecutorService running all commands synchronously in the caller thread.
SynchronousQueuedExecutorService An ExecutorService that enqueues all commmands.
TaskCallbackDispatcher Helper object for implementing ITaskListenerSupport.
TaskListenerAdapter  
TaskSequence<R> experimental
TaskStep<R> experimental
